name: Clown Factory: Revitalized
description:
Clown Factory: Revitalized is an RPG game about a group of girls who get lost in an abandoned hospital that has been turned into a factory full of clown people. Take the role of the protagonist, and get help from her friends she meets around the factory and help them find out the secrets of this hospital and the truth about what happened...

-

Currently the game is only playable on PC but I will be optimizing it for other platforms in time. Right now I plan on adding it to Linux and Android.

-

Crossover:

Mayonaka no Mirai x Clown Factory; you can obtain various items from the comic "MAYONAKA NO MIRAI" based on the members of the Rewinderz. You can purchase them from Content, the blue haired shop owner with the blue dress.
